content: this mini sun hat is about the size of 3 5″ diameter brim to brim and i crochet it with my stashed raffia yarn a leftover over from my various raffia crochet patterns it is a quick-to-complete crochet pattern that you can whip up a few hats in a day make it for your doll or amigurumi toy it is also perfect accessories for barbie doll i am going to dig out my barbie doll to show you in social media apart from making for dolls it can be attached to a hook and make into bag charms and keychain too great as a little gift to friends and colleagues **materials** 3 0mm hook stashed raffia yarn or acrylic yarn 2 colors **tools** darning needle scissors **instructions** 1 crochet all parts by following the crochet patterns stated below 2 tie the bow to the hat 3 weave in all yarn ends ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ **abbreviations** chain chain single_crochet single_crochet hb horizontal bar refer to the tutorial picture below slip_stitch slip_stitch increase 2sc increase ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
